recipe-defaults.step-text:
Postopek priprave recepta, kot tudi druga polja v receptu podpirajo markdown sintakso.

**Dodaj povezavo**

[Moja povezava](https://demo.mealie.io)

mealplan.no-recipes-match-your-rules: Noben recept ne ustreza vašim pogojem

user.ldap-update-password-unavailable: Gesla ni mogoče posodobiti, uporabnik je nadzorovan preko LDAP

exceptions.permission_denied: Nimate dovoljenja za izvedbo zahtevanega dejanja
exceptions.username-conflict-error: To uporabniško ime je že zasedeno
exceptions.email-conflict-error: Ta e-mail je že v uporabi

password.subject: Mealie Forgot Password
password.message_top: You have requested to reset your password.
password.message_bottom: Please click the button above to reset your password.

invitation.message_top: You have been invited to join Mealie.
invitation.message_bottom: Please click the button above to accept the invitation.

test.message_bottom: Please click the button above to test the email.
